Save_mesh_xdmf.description: Set to True to save each iteration of mesh adaptation as xdmf file (default: false)

Save_solution_xdmf.description: Set to True to save each time iteration of the solution as xdmf file (default: true)

Output_dir.description: Set the directory to save and read the mesh ans solution files

mesh_filename.description: Set the filename baseline to read the mesh files

tumor_tag.description: Set the physical tag of the tumor region in the mesh
